dependencies: Go standard library only (no third-party modules) — go.mod, main.go
GitHub Actions: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v1, gitleaks/gitleaks-action@v2, pavi2410/html-preview-action@v2, actions/checkout@v2/v3 — .github/workflows/main.yml
Security tooling used in CI: trufflehog3 (pip) — .github/workflows/main.yml
architectural_resources: Containerized web application listening on :8080 (API/web service) — main.go, Dockerfile
AWS ECR repository (image push target) implied by workflow and script (repository name pw_ecr_dsop_webapp) — .github/workflows/main.yml, script/install.sh
Terraform-managed AWS infrastructure implied (script/workflow run terraform init/apply; references outputs ecr_repository_uri, alb_hostname) — script/install.sh, .github/workflows/main.yml
Application Load Balancer (ALB) implied by terraform output alb_hostname and printed URL — script/install.sh
